[{"id":13263114,"title":"Psychic TV @ Churchill's Pub in Miami, FL","datetime":"2016-12-02T21:00:00","formatted_datetime":"Friday, December 2, 2016 at 9:00PM","formatted_location":"Miami, FL","ticket_url":"http://www.bandsintown.com/event/13263114/buy_tickets?app_id=ticketgame&artist=Psychic+TV&came_from=67","ticket_type":"Tickets","ticket_status":"available","on_sale_datetime":null,"facebook_rsvp_url":"http://www.bandsintown.com/event/13263114?app_id=ticketgame&artist=Psychic+TV&came_from=67","description":"Look Alive Fest takes yet another trip around a blazing hot Miami sun. Fair warning: this show will most likely sell out, so plan accordingly.
Psychic TV (UK/NY)Debut Miami performance
Born in 1981 from industrial music pioneers Throbbing Gristle, Psychic TV is fronted by Throbbing Gristle’s founder: anti-hero, artist, and Pandrogenist, Genesis Breyer P-Orridge. Psychic TV is particularly known for its intense and visceral live performances and for a creative lineage that includes cultural luminaries such as William S. Burroughs, Derek Jarman, and Timothy Leary, among others.
Destruction Unit (AZ)Only FL appearance"In about five years, Destruction Unit, from Tempe, Ariz., has wormed its way toward its present status as one of the most hair-raising bands in North America. It plays tight, fast punk wrapped in deep layers of pulsating fuzz: The effect is something between a ritual and an attack. "Negative Feedback Resistor" delivers you a band in its own world, but the record is intensely charged, almost floating, saturated with wild action." - New York Times
Temple of Bon Matin (PA)Only FL appearanceImagine a jam session with Glenn Branca & Hawkwind and it probably wouldn't sound too far off from the Philadelphia-based noise rock collective Temple of Bon Matin. Their near-atonal freakouts, far from simple exercises in repetition and annoyance, are as challenging and uncompromising as rock music gets.
Horoscope & Surprise Guest (FL/NY)Only FL appearanceHoroscope is the multimedia project of Miami native and Brooklyn resident, Rene J Nunez Cabrera. Cabrera’s live performances are as much a raw, uncensored vehicle of personal catharsis as they are a ritualistic forecast of what the future may hold for those who attend. With numerous cassette releases on labels such as Ascetic house and Acid Casualty Productions and tours with a wide range of artists, Horoscope has been a fixture in contemporary noise circles.
Collapsing Scenery (NY)Collapsing Scenery is the latest project from multi-instrumentalist, vocalist, and songwriter Don Devore, best known for his work with Sick Feeling, The Icarus Line, and Lilys. The band pairs experimental electronic music with noise rock and sound collage.
Drowning the Virgin Silence (FL)Drowning the Virgin Silence is a musical project of multi-instrumentalist Richard Vergez, who explores electro-acoustic and post-industrial music through the use of prepared tapes and manipulated sound.
Other Body (FL)
Other Body is a Miami three piece lurking in the most punishing fringes of noise, rock and experimental music.
"Special Guests"
Visuals by Tachyons+ and Secret Celluloid Society.
Pay attention.Presented by Quiet Mind Recordings with generous support from the Institute of Contemporary Art, Miami, and Radio-Active Records.
